title: RIP Poro
body:
The Winter Wonder Orianna Splash looks great and-wait, what's that?

Is that a dead Poro in the background? DID YOU BASTARDS KILL A PORO!? WHY?! WHY WOULD YOU KILL SUCH AN INNOCENT AND FLUFFY CREATURE?!

replies.body: I trusted you...
WHY
Cannot be unseen
WOW

Why did I do it =(

I don't know if i should downvote to keep anyone else from seeing it or if I should upvote because I'm a terrible person
da fuq!! WHY DID I LOOK lol
It even hides it with the images on the initial google search page all being poros!!! And then you click the "images" tab and you want to gouge your eyes out 0_0
I don't know who you are, but...
it's weird how "poro king" and "king poro" differ in search lol...for those under 18 um...don't do "king poro" lol

> it's weird how "poro king" and "king poro" differ in search lol...for those under 18 um...don't do "king poro" lol

#I had safe-search off in Google

http://i.imgur.com/xqWGUzi.jpg
OMG WHAI

Is it on the same level of dead poro?
Never searched it but heard it was awful

> http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/3c991edba01d6be7a2444632fe77d5de.jpg
> 
> No lie. True Story.

#WHY the hell does Darius look like John Travolta?

> http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/3c991edba01d6be7a2444632fe77d5de.jpg
> 
> No lie. True Story.

But... but why? {{summoner:3}}
what happens when you google "dead poro"... people said not to... anyone brave enough to do it and share your findings?
http://cdn.meme.am/instances/500x/55317380.jpg
Please dont, although when you read this, you feel the sudden need to :I **CURIOSITY **
WHY DID THIS HAPPEN

Why?

Why would you do this?
... im done
... im done

IT'S A FLIPPIN PORO SKIN RUG! RIOT HOW COULD YOU!

{{champion:77}} "If PETA asks, this skin is fake."
plot twist: it's not a real poro skin rug
Poro rug in beta merch store confirmed.
RIP in peace

> RIP in peace
> 

Rest In Peace in peace?
No...Rest In Paradise in peace, why would you want them to be just in peace? Why not in paradise?
RIP in piece, he never made it to the ATM machine. MFW when his face is X_X   :^(
Bless his soul....

Don't ever EVER search King Poro images on google. It will scar you for life.

Credit to HeraldOne for scarring my soul.

EDIT: You have been warned.....

> Don't ever EVER search King Poro images on google. It will scar you for life.
> 
> Credit to HeraldOne for scarring my soul.
> 
> EDIT: You have been warned.....

OK I CAN HANDLE THE REAL SHIT BUT NOT THE FUCKIN LION KING CMON
{{champion:61}} I know what makes poros tick. I know how to make the ticking stop.

Actually Udyr (the rioter not champion) said on reddit that it is actually a faux rug and a giant poro drank too much egg nog and passed out right in front of it.

[Source](http://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2o709x/riot_you_have_gone_too_far_this_is_an_outrage/)
That looks too large to be a poro. {{champion:20}}  More like the Yeti he rides.

Poro Rider Sejuani.

In other News. I think a certain Boar may have been involved in this. . .
RIOT! FOR THIS I'M GONNA SUE YOU FOR PORO ABUSE!!!!!!! >:(
They fall apart so easily. How do you put them back together?
I guess that's where the Shadow Isles Poro came from...
I told them but they didnt {{champion:64}}
As if you've never had the urge to overfeed poro with poro-snax and watch him blow up......
HOLY SHIT THREAD MAKER IS A BIONICLE FAN

I approve.

You know, if y'all want them everywhere, there gotta be *dead* ones too.

Now I want that rug, would look nice in my home...
Looks more like nunu
and braum seems fine with it :'(
IF YOU LOOK IN THE UPPER LEFT HAND CORNER YOU CAN SEE BRAUMS SHEILD. IT'S BRAUMS HOUSE OMG!!!!
RIP PORO (lol i saw it in the video and i was like no he die)
Anyone know whose shadow is in the poro wallpaper? It looks like some sort of spiked figure like morde's armor but i'm not sure

{{champion:61}}  wants a poro rug.

EVIL!!!!!!!
